channel.title: STAR WARS rsps
channel.description:
hey guy's, shrogg here.
i was wondering if anyone would be intrested in a "star wars" rsps? i have heap's of idea's but no coding experience...
[size=20pt].::MY IDEA::. [/size]
well now that i know that rsps's can be modified in most way's and coded to use new thing's i was thinking of making a seclection of new "npc's" for this, like yoda, the trainer for the good side of the force.you can seclect what you want to be I.E a clone troper, you have set amour, but instead of being a clone trooper for your whole life you can rank up, and become more powerfull.
[size=10pt].::SCRAPPING ALL SKILLS::.[/size]
yes that's right i want NO skills from rs WHAT so ever. we will have (for the clone's) a skill called (somthing like) LOYALTY. this skill level's up like your combat skill's in rs, but it also get's you a "rank up" every 10 level's. so at rank 40 you could be a 2'nd lieutenant (or whatever)
you could also have a skilling skill, like engineering, in which you build thing's like gun's and power core's which you can salvage off shot down ship's using the "scavenging" skill
there will also be a nother race beside's clone's called the "rebels" and they will have all the same stuff as the clone's.
BOTh race's will have jedi's but at the lower level's they would suck (you are still a paduwan) and at approx lvl 70-75 you will hit jedi arnk and pown (not too mutch tho)
this will have realistic exp so it's still a challange to play.
if many people are intrested in helping me on this please post and i might consider a dev team :)

item.title: STAR WARS rsps
item.dc:creator: @mr_arrows95 bansil
item.description:
@mr_arrows95 wrote:

This sounds Good acutally But why use a RSPS?? If your scrapping all skills this sounds nothing like runescape why not use another Engine?

Read full topic

I’d like to help, I can code clients, sources, and I can make models. So whatever you need I’s like to help.

There is a topic in Development teams, check there before posting.

item.title: STAR WARS rsps
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

OMG U COULD BUILD SHIPS TO FLY TO OTHER PLACES!!! lol so if u used map editor and also edited the map u could like, make seperate planets… have blackness and stars between ur tiny planets… Pvp zones, dog fights… that would b pretty awesome actually

Read full topic

item.title: STAR WARS rsps
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

what i ment by that was that the blank source server dosent have to have skill’s coded into it, it just need’s to be stable
but yeah i was thinking that insteadof cooking there could be healing, so you could be a medic if you want and heal neerby team mate’s.
but yeah range will be ranged (or a name that suit’s gun’s more) and melee will be for jedi’s and the force will be mage :0
mining would be cool, but add better rock’s for the star wars theme
construction could be mixed with smithing to produce “engineering”

yeah

Read full topic

item.title: STAR WARS rsps
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“shrogg, post:7, topic:323062”]ok, well ill post a big topic on it in the development team section, ill use a blank souce (skill’s dont need to be coded )
and i hope to get a decent server / client going.[/quote]

But u do need to code skills… They just need to be different skills…
Not everyone in the Star Wars universe is on the front line… Some four years ago I played Star wars online game… Galaxy i think? Btw… People found ways to do stuff… yet i do remember the game involving alot of killing… Idk, possibly farming could still exists as a skill, Range could be shooting skill (blasters) And Melee for the Jedis, Magic would be the force… U could probably keep fishing and cooking, Possibly add hunter if its a 317, if its a 508 ur already set, Im sure mining could still be used, Slayer could be combined with hunter actually and you could also keep theiving, and POSSIBLY construction (again, if its a 508)… Besides that all the other skills would be scrapped…

Read full topic

item.title: STAR WARS rsps
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

ok, well ill post a big topic on it in the development team section, ill use a blank souce (skill’s dont need to be coded )
and i hope to get a decent server / client going.

i have heap’s of idea’s but no coding experience…

Thats kinda the “Your screwed” part… But yea i have same issue XD[/quote]

@topic
I’d like to see it, more models = more publicity if you continued this project
